greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: Multiplicative with a(p^e) = p^(2e mod p).
link: Antti Karttunen, Table of n, a(n) for n = 1..16384
program: (PARI) A328621(n) = { my(f = factor(n)); for(k=1, #f~, f[k,2] = ((2*f[k,2])%f[k,1])); factorback(f); };
xref: Cf. A011262, A327938, A328618 (a bijective variant).
results.author: _Antti Karttunen_, Oct 23 2019
